00011 
00012 //    Fixed is_pointer, is_reference, is_const, is_volatile, is_same, 
00013 //    is_member_pointer based on the Simulated Partial Specialization work 
00014 //    of Mat Marcus and Jesse Jones. See  http://opensource.adobe.com or 
00015 //    http://groups.yahoo.com/group/boost/message/5441 
00016 //    Some workarounds in here use ideas suggested from "Generic<Programming>: 
00017 //    Mappings between Types and Values" 
00018 //    by Andrei Alexandrescu (see http://www.cuj.com/experts/1810/alexandr.html).
00019 
00020 
00021 #ifndef BOOST_TT_IS_MEMBER_POINTER_HPP_INCLUDED
00022 #define BOOST_TT_IS_MEMBER_POINTER_HPP_INCLUDED
00023 
00024 #include "boost/type_traits/config.hpp"
00025 #include "boost/detail/workaround.hpp"
00026 
00027 #if !defined(BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION) && !BOOST_WORKAROUND(__BORLANDC__, < 0x600)
00028 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_member_function_pointer.hpp"
00029 #else
00030 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_reference.hpp"
00031 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_array.hpp"
00032 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/is_mem_fun_pointer_tester.hpp"
00033 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/yes_no_type.hpp"
00034 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/false_result.hpp"
00035 #   include "boost/type_traits/detail/ice_or.hpp"
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 // should be the last #include
00039 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_def.hpp"
00040 
00041 namespace boost {
00042 
00043 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(__BORLANDC__, < 0x600)
00044 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_member_pointer,T,false)
00045 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_2(typename T,typename U,is_member_pointer,U T::*,true)
00046 
00047 #elif !defined(BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION)
00048 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_member_pointer,T,::boost::is_member_function_pointer<T>::value)
00049 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_PARTIAL_SPEC1_2(typename T,typename U,is_member_pointer,U T::*,true)
00050 
00051 #else // no partial template specialization
00052 
00053 namespace detail {
00054 
00055 template <typename R, typename T>
00056 ::boost::type_traits::yes_type BOOST_TT_DECL is_member_pointer_tester(R T::*);
00057 ::boost::type_traits::no_type BOOST_TT_DECL is_member_pointer_tester(...);
00058 
00059 template <bool>
00060 struct is_member_pointer_select
00061     : ::boost::type_traits::false_result
00062 {
00063 };
00064 
00065 template <>
00066 struct is_member_pointer_select<false>
00067 {
00068     template <typename T> struct result_
00069     {
00070         static T& make_t();
00071         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(
00072             bool, value =
00073             (::boost::type_traits::ice_or<
00074                 (1 == sizeof(::boost::type_traits::is_mem_fun_pointer_tester(make_t()))),
00075                 (1 == sizeof(is_member_pointer_tester(make_t())))
00076             >::value) );
00077     };
00078 };
00079 
00080 template <typename T>
00081 struct is_member_pointer_impl
00082     : is_member_pointer_select<
00083           ::boost::type_traits::ice_or<
00084               ::boost::is_reference<T>::value
00085             , ::boost::is_array<T>::value
00086             >::value
00087         >::template result_<T>
00088 {
00089 };
00090 
00091 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_member_pointer,void,false)
00092 #ifndef BOOST_NO_CV_VOID_SPECIALIZATIONS
00093 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_member_pointer,void const,false)
00094 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_member_pointer,void volatile,false)
00095 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_IMPL_SPEC1(is_member_pointer,void const volatile,false)
00096 #endif
00097 
00098 } // namespace detail
00099 
00100 BOOST_TT_AUX_BOOL_TRAIT_DEF1(is_member_pointer,T,::boost::detail::is_member_pointer_impl<T>::value)
00101 
00102 #endif // __BORLANDC__
00103 
00104 } // namespace boost
00105 
00106 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/bool_trait_undef.hpp"
00107 
00108 #endif // BOOST_TT_IS_MEMBER_POINTER_HPP_INCLUDED
